message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could we perhaps meet in the middle at $11,000?  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I've considered your proposal and I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would $10,500 be acceptable for the product?
